name: Everything Bagel Seasoning Crackers
description: If you are a fan of  Trader Joe’s famous Everything Bagel Seasoning, you are going to love these vegan Everything Bagel Crackers! Made with 4 ingredients only! A great snack served with hummus, or any soup!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup whole wheat pastry flour (or use a mix of all-purpose and wheat flour)
2 tbsp everything but the bagel seasoning
2 tbsp neutral oil (or softened vegan butter )

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix in the flour, salt, and seasoning. Combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix in the flour, salt, and seasoning. Combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oil and mix in, so that it is evenly distributed in the dry mixture, and there are some crumbs of the flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oil and mix in, so that it is evenly distributed in the dry mixture, and there are some crumbs of the flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the water 1-2 tbsp at a time, and make a dough that is not too sticky. You don't want to add too much water and keep the dough on the slightly hard side.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the water 1-2 tbsp at a time, and make a dough that is not too sticky. You don't want to add too much water and keep the dough on the slightly hard side.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the dough comes together, let it sit for 5 minutes, then knead again to make it a bit smooth, then roll it out between two parchment sheets to 1-2 millimeters thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the dough comes together, let it sit for 5 minutes, then knead again to make it a bit smooth, then roll it out between two parchment sheets to 1-2 millimeters thick.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a pizza cutter or sharp knife, score the rolled out dough, then transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet, bake at 300 degrees Fahrenheit for 15 minutes, then check. Move some of the crackers around and bake more if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a pizza cutter or sharp knife, score the rolled out dough, then transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet, bake at 300 degrees Fahrenheit for 15 minutes, then check. Move some of the crackers around and bake more if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: I like to bake it with the fan on, but if you dont have fan that works as well.
recipeInstructions.name: I like to bake it with the fan on, but if you dont have fan that works as well.

keywords: Everything bagel crackers, vegan crackers recipe
